column2: Members seek to install §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! as the Permanent Regency of [This.GetName]§!. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.

Members seek to maintain the Permanent Regency headed by §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!. Should §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§! seek to end the Permanent Regency by force §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will have the support of the faction members.

Members seek to install §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! as the Permanent Regency of [This.GetName]§!. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.

Members seek to maintain the Permanent Regency headed by §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!. Should §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§! seek to end the Permanent Regency by force §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will have the support of the faction members.

Members seek to install §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! as the Permanent Regency of [This.GetName]§!. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.

Members seek to maintain the Permanent Regency headed by §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!. Should §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§! seek to end the Permanent Regency by force §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will have the support of the faction members.
Members seek to proclaim a Shogunate headed by §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.

Members seek the end of the Shogunate headed by [From.Liege.GetBestName] and the restoration of direct rule from the Chrysanthemum Throne. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.

Members seek to depose §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§! in favor of another member of the Imperial Family. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
